general_objective_and_specifications.description: Procedures will be established to validate analytical methods. These procedures will contain the verification of the statistical prerequisites of the calibration (distribution of data, homogeneity of variances, linearity, etc.), the determination of limit values using selected methods, and tests for drift and carry-over. The procedures will be applied to routinely used methods like the determination of nicotine, aldehydes, and glycerol and to methods currently being established.
